analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0x74e711f1179f559e1cd7817050cf198b67129269.sol:
	Contract BitcoinRed has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0x74e711f1179f559e1cd7817050cf198b67129269.sol#225)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0x74e711f1179f559e1cd7817050cf198b67129269.sol#95) is not in mixedCase
